query: SELECT 'users' as tabela, COUNT(*) as total FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%teste%' OR name LIKE '%test%' UNION ALL SELECT 'lojas', COUNT(*) FROM lojas WHERE nome LIKE '%teste%' OR nome LIKE '%test%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT 'users' as tabela, COUNT(*) as total FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%teste%' OR name LIKE '%test%' UNION ALL SELECT 'lojas', COUNT(*) FROM lojas WHERE nome LIKE '%teste%' OR nome LIKE '%test%'
